name: misdiagnose
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to state that a person has a particular illness or condition, when in fact they have a different one: Early signs can easily be misdiagnosed as arthritis. She underwent unnecessary surgery because doctors misdiagnosed her with cancer.
More examplesFewer examplesA hospital misdiagnosed his condition as the flu and discharged him.Whooping cough is often misdiagnosed as bronchitis.It would be very easy to misdiagnose because very few physicians see anthrax.
